action_items.task: Talk to Maria to discuss bandwidth regarding the CV program and provide an answer
Chase the web view idea with Emma to discuss required customizations
Formalize discussions and create a decision tree outlining three options for app development (Web View first, Mixed approach, React Native from start) including costs and risks to present to Laurel
Create reasonable assumptions around the AI-calculated impact numbers to come up with a revenue estimate
Ask about a time box around the CV program initiative

decisions.what: Three app development options to be formalized: Option 1 (Web View first), Option 2 (Mixed approach with React Native for select features), Option 3 (React Native from start)
decisions.context: Need to evaluate costs and risks for each approach. Web View estimated at 2-4 weeks for one engineer, Mixed approach at 4 months for one engineer. If Web View exceeds 2 months, will move directly to React Native.

decisions.what: CV program will be structured as a time-boxed initiative with Prateek Jajoo taking ownership
decisions.context: Prateek will work with Maria and a team to drive outcomes. Decision on acceptance pending bandwidth discussion with Maria.

decisions.what: Prioritized features for React Native development: dashboard, digital guide, managing/selecting meals
decisions.context: These are frequently used by retained customers. High-usage quick actions like reschedule and pause are more important than dashboard for improving estimations.

feedback: Nikita is angling towards Prateek taking ownership of the CV program initiative, viewing it as a good opportunity for Prateek to understand customer experience and funnel

blockers.issue: Apple App Store approval risks for web view approach
Variable effort estimation for web view due to shared code with HelloFresh
Bandwidth constraints for taking on CV program ownership

key_topics: App development strategy and technology options
Web view vs React Native implementation
Cost and risk analysis for app development approaches
